bot.summary: The user asks how many events are taking place at the 2018 PyeongChang Winter Olympics and if spectator reservations have already begun. The AI responds that there are 102 events in total, and spectator reservations have started. The AI also mentions that understanding the events requires knowledge of exercise physiology as they involve various scientific theories related to exercise and human body responses.
